price: Mwenyezi Mungu ndiye aliye umba mbingu na ardhi na viliomo baina yao kwa siku sita, na akatawala kwenye Kiti cha Enzi. Nyinyi hamna mlinzi wala mwombezi isipo kuwa Yeye tu. Basi, je, hamkumbuki?
arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ مَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا شَفِيعٍۚ أَفَلَا تَتَذَكَّرُونَ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu aliye umba mbingu na ardhi na vilio baina yao kwa siku sita, kisha akatawala juu ya Kiti cha Enzi, A'rshi, kwa utawala ulio laiki naye. Nyinyi hamna badala yake Yeye yeyote msaidizi wa kukunusuruni, wala mwombezi wa kukuombeeni. Basi je, mtaendelea kushikilia kuwa katika ukafiri na inda, wala msiwaidhike kwa mawaidha ya Mwenyezi Mungu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: al-lahu alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā fī sittati ayyāmin thumma is'tawā ʿalā al-ʿarshi mā lakum min dūnihi min waliyyin walā shafīʿin afalā tatadhakkarūna
